name: Redstone Run
description:
Deep in the mine the redstone dust is waiting to be collected, but there are many creepers in the way!

Run deep into the mine collecting redstone dust and dodging deadly creepers, fire pits, and lava flows! All your favorite running, jumping, turning and sliding, with hostile creepers, redstone blocks, lava pits, head-smashing barriers and other hazards. How deep can you go in the mine? How much redstone can you grab?

Features:

-Collect redstone dust deep in the mine!
-Creepers are chasing you!
-Avoid perilous pits and bridges!
-Jump and dodge oncoming creepers!
-Running, sliding, and jumping!
-Rails, dispensers, repeaters!
-Redstone drops throughout the mine!
